remarks: Property of a monomorphism.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
ismon.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
ismon.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
ismon.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
ismon.s $e |- M = ( Mono ` C ) $.
ismon.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
ismon.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
ismon.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
moni.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
moni.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( X M Y ) ) $.
moni.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( Z H X ) ) $.
moni.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( Z H X ) ) $.
moni $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F ( <. Z , X >. .x. Y ) G ) = ( F ( <. Z , X >. .x. Y ) K ) <-> G = K ) ) $.
